description: Detects basic PowerShell Remoting (WinRM) by monitoring for network inbound connections to ports 5985 OR 5986 Author: Roberto Rodriguez @Cyb3rWard0g. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate use of remote PowerShell execution
name: Remote PowerShell Sessions Network Connections (WinRM)
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"5156" AND DestPort:("5985" OR "5986") AND LayerRTID:"44")
